snippet: The search for a replacement for Mike Pelfrey continues, with the Mets sending Chris Schwinden back to the minors and handing the ball to the long reliever Miguel Batista.
abstract: The search for a replacement for Mike Pelfrey continues, with the Mets sending Chris Schwinden back to the minors and handing the ball to the long reliever Miguel Batista.

headline.main: After Giving Youngster a Try, the Mets Turn to a Veteran
